committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the founding of the Military Intelligence Service Language School, and to command Justice John Fujio Aiso for his distinguished contributions to the school.

summary.text: Commemorates the thirty-fifth anniversary of the founding of the Military Intelligence Service Language School and commends Justice John Fujio Aiso for his contributions toward the School.

titles.title: A resolution to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the founding of the Military Intelligence Service Language School, and to command Justice John Fujio Aiso for his distinguished contributions to the school.
